title: Uber Plans to Deploy 25K Robotaxis With Autonomous Trucking Startup
description: Uber is teaming up with Waabi, an autonomous trucking outfit led by an Uber alum, to deploy robotaxis. Business Insider spoke with Waabi COO Lior Ron., My Insider
content:
[Transportation](https://www.businessinsider.com/transportation)

- Waabi is a Canadian autonomous trucking outfit founded by Uber alum Raquel Urtasun.
- Uber is investing $250M in Waabi for plans to deploy 25,000 robotaxis over time.
- Waabi COO Lior Ron, an Uber alum, told Business Insider how the startup will help Uber scale robotaxis.

Uber has a new plan to get 25,000 robotaxis on the road — and
